textBeforeTable: T – Z G – M N – S A – F Tunes without an artist’s name do not contain sound files but do contain other tune information. The tunes index  contains most tunes in the piobaireachd repertoire with links to recordings and manuscript sources where possible and also information about current sources and publications.  The interpretations of tunes in the recordings are those of the player. Tunes Index - N-S Donald MacDonald Volume 1 Sister's Lament Hannay-MacAuslin Manuscript Cumh na Paithair, the Sister's Lament The Sister's Lamen Angus MacKay Manuscript The Sister's Lament CC V1 22 Daughter’s Lament John MacDougall-Gillies Manuscript Lament The Sisters Colin Cameron Manuscript 13 The Sisters Lament. Cumha na piuthar More PS book 4 Kilberry Binneas Availability This recording of Donald MacPherson's winning tune at Oban in 1986 is from the College of Piping Archive The full story is in Binneas is Boreraig. The tune is closely related to The Brother's Lament in the MacArthur-MacGregor Manuscript (tune 15) and in Angus MacKay's manuscript tune 9
